Pre-Game Insights: Atlanta Braves manager Brian Snitker inserted closer Raisel Iglesias into the eighth inning in search of a 4-out save.
Despite a 4-run blown lead, the Braves managed to escape with a win.
The Braves need to treat Wednesday's contest in Minnesota with the same urgency as previous games.
The Braves remain six games behind the Philadelphia Phillies in the NL East.
The Braves still have only a three-game lead on the New York Mets for the final NL wild card spot.
To have a realistic shot at catching the Phillies, the Braves probably have to win three of four this weekend.
Cy Young candidate Chris Sale is scheduled to pitch against the Twins on Wednesday.
David Festa, with a 5.20 ERA this season, will be pitching for the Twins against Sale.
